name.description: The prefix name of the injectable class.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the injectable class?

path.description: The path at which to create the injectable class, relative to the workspace root.

type.description: The suffix name of the injectable class. (default: service)
type.x-prompt: What type would you like to use for the injectable class?

flat.description: When true (the default), creates files at the top level of the project.

skipTests.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test file.

lintFix.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the injectable class.
